hero.title: Safe, reliable electrical work for your home
hero.subtitle: Licensed electricians specializing in home electrical repairs, upgrades, and installations. From outlets to panel upgrades, we do it right. Same-day service available. Trusted by homeowners since 2010.

about.title: Your Home Electrical Experts
about.subtitle: Licensed, insured, and trusted
about.content: HomeWire specializes exclusively in residential electrical work. From troubleshooting problems to whole-home rewiring, our licensed electricians treat your home with care. Clean work, honest pricing, and safety-first approach.

products.name: Outlet & Switch Service
products.description: Install, replace, or repair outlets and switches. GFCI outlets for safety. Same-day service available.

products.name: Ceiling Fan Installation
products.description: Professional ceiling fan installation with proper support and wiring. Includes fan or you provide yours.

products.name: Panel Upgrade
products.description: Upgrade to 200-amp panel for modern electrical needs. Includes permits and inspection. Safe and code-compliant.

products.name: Lighting Installation
products.description: Install interior or exterior lighting. Recessed lights, chandeliers, outdoor fixtures. Professional installation.

products.name: Electrical Troubleshooting
products.description: Diagnose electrical problems. Tripping breakers, flickering lights, outlets not working. Expert diagnosis.

products.name: Whole-Home Surge Protection
products.description: Protect your entire home from power surges. Safeguard electronics and appliances. Peace of mind.

items.text: Upgraded our electrical panel and added outlets throughout the house. Professional work, clean job site, and passed inspection first try. Highly recommend!
items.author: Michael Johnson
items.title: Homeowner

items.text: Had flickering lights driving me crazy. They diagnosed the problem quickly and fixed it same day. Fair pricing and excellent service!
items.author: Sarah Thompson
items.title: Happy Customer

items.text: Installed ceiling fans in three bedrooms. Showed up on time, worked efficiently, cleaned up after. Perfect job! Using them for all electrical needs now.
items.author: Robert Kim
items.title: Regular Customer

members.name: Tom Peterson
members.title: Master Electrician & Owner
members.bio: Licensed Master Electrician with 20+ years experience in residential electrical work. Specializes in troubleshooting, panel upgrades, and whole-home electrical solutions.
